description: Sandra Marakkala Sadamali Wickramasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Sandra Marakkala Sadamali Wickramasinghe Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Failure to put the accused’s case during cross examination – Unbiased and independent witness – Adequacy of witnesses in establishing a fact – Criminal breach of trust – Right of an accused to a fair trial
legistation: Section 391 of the Penal Code, Section 134 of the Evidence Ordinance No.15 of 1985
